House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01721
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DEFINING THE VISION AND POLICIES OF GOVERNMENT IN THE HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT SECTOR, CREATING THE DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT, DEFINING ITS MANDATE, POWERS AND FUNCTIONS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Department Of Housing And Urban Development Act
ABSTRACT : Creates a Department of Housing and Urban Development which is tasked to advise the President of the Republic on the promulgation of rules, regulations and other issuances relative to matters regarding the management of housing and urban development.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BIAZON, ROZZANO RUFINO B.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-19
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE

          -Created a Technical Working Group
      2. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-03-13
      3. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-10-03
      4. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-10-03
          -Substitute Bill to House Bills Numbered 449, 1518, 1721, 3375, 3639 and 5114 was approved with amendments.
